summary: PARTIAL VALIDATION - structure exists but weaker than claimed

exclusive_percentage.metric: Percentage of MIDDLEs that are product-exclusive

mean_profile_difference.metric: Mean L1/2 distance between product PREFIX profiles

folio_classifications.verdict: UNSTABLE - classifications sensitive to data quality

interpretation: Product-exclusive MIDDLEs still exist (71.8%) but product type discrimination is weaker than originally claimed. The mean profile difference (0.064) is now below the 0.1 threshold that would indicate strong product-specific signatures. The structure exists but is not as robust as initially reported.
